New Records: Shohei Ohtani became the first player in MLB history to have 50 home runs and 50 stolen bases in a single season during the game.
Key Match Events: Shohei Ohtani recorded 10 stolen bases and hit 3 home runs, including his 50th and 51st of the season, during the game.
Post-Match Reflections: The Los Angeles Dodgers clinched a postseason berth with their 20-4 victory over the Miami Marlins.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was highlighted by Shohei Ohtani's historic performance and the Dodgers' dominant win.
